Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.cfg

[Java] Class GrailsPlaceholderConfigurer

            • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.cfg.GrailsPlaceholderConfigurer

            • Uses Grails' ConfigObject for place holder values.

              Authors:
              Graeme Rocher
              Since:
              1.0
